structure.unit: State Recreation Areas Outside Of The Metropolitan Parks District

law.catch_line: Municipal Wastes; Discharge Into Ocean Sanctuaries; Variance; Application Requirements

text.section: The application shall include a final facilities plan approved by the division of water pollution control, and a final environmental impact report.
The application shall include an evaluation of alternatives, including land disposal.
The application shall demonstrate that land disposal is not a feasible alternative for all or a part of the discharge.
The application shall demonstrate how the applicant satisfies all requirements of section sixteen B.
